content: I am in discussions about the structure of medical history records and could not work out where this landed with discussions so far - did the Agency come to any conclusion on this one? Currently I have Conditions and Procedures represented but there is a query whether I should just use Condition for all entries... procedures recorded here may be historical or have occured in the clinic no real way to tell the difference
there is dsicussion on this at GF#10662
note that there is an open invitation for examples - I need to find Australian examples that illustrate the question - do you want to help me out there
